text: Myristica guillauminiana is a species of plant in the family Myristicaceae. It is found in Fiji and the Solomon Islands. ==References== * World Conservation Monitoring Centre 1998. Myristica guillauminiana. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species.
